title: Thousands Of Holidaymakers Do Not Know They Can Claim Holiday Compensation Says UK Airport Car Parks
text:
Each year tens of thousands of people complain about their holidays on Trip Advisor, but the majority of them do not know they can claim compensation for a holiday from hell.
Manchester Car Parking Experts UK Airport Car Parks, says more consumers need to know their rights when it comes to holidays from hell. According to the company that helps holidaymakers save money on their airport car parking needs, more people need to claim compensation.
Each year tens of thousands of people turn to Trip Advisor and other travel sites to complain about holidays from hell. However, not many of them understand that they can claim compensation for distress that has been caused.
Chris Fryer from UK Airport Car Parks said: “When a person pays for a holiday they should expect the best possible holiday ever. If that holiday were not what they expected, then they should seek compensation.”
There are many things a person can claim for if the holiday does not live up to their expectations. These are listed at http://www.ukairportcarparks.co.uk/blog/holiday-compensation-claims
Travel agents and travel companies are trained to avoid compensation claims. When a person complains about a problem with their holiday, they will receive a nice letter and maybe receive a small discount coupon for their next holiday. According to UK Airport Car Parks ( http://www.ukairportcarparks.co.uk ) that is not enough.
The travel experts would like to see travel companies take complaints more seriously instead of trying to reduce the compensation they pay out. If a person is not happy with the compensation they receive from a travel company after a complaint is made, they should seek legal advice.
